DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety effectiveness cryoablation radiofrequency ablation treatment commonest kind supraventricular tachycardia , namely atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia . The study hypothesis cryoablation non-inferior radiofrequency .
